title: Introduction to Estate Agents
headline: This free online training course equips you with the professional skills required to work as a real estate agent.
description: A real estate agent facilitates the sale, rental or purchase of properties for their clients. This course explains how to ‘list’ properties by finding sellers. We go through the valuation process and examine property letting strategies, digital marketing and regulations relevant to estate agents. We also sharpen your negotiation skills to help you find buyers. This course provides the skills required to work as an employee or independent agent.
courseDescription:
Real estate agents earn their living by helping people to sell or buy property. If you like talking to people and thrive on making social contacts, this offers a rewarding and promising profession. This course begins by teaching you the basics of finding sellers and listing properties. We lay out the difference between valuation, evaluation and appraisal before highlighting the negotiation skills required by an estate agent.

We then explain how to find buyers and list a property for sale or rent. A professional estate agent must be able to employ the letting process efficiently and we provide this skill. Today’s digital technology can drive the marketing of your products and services. Our lesson on digital marketing and ‘lead magnets’ adds conviction to your decisions as you learn to confidently sell yourself as well as real estate.

The course goes through the regulations governing this profession before explaining how real estate agents establish their credibility through qualifications and their enforcement. The career path of an estate agent can lead upward by offering better earnings and leadership roles, both in sales or property management. Sign up to take advantage of this training course and acquire the skills you need to work as a real estate agent.
